mapper.select: select * from t_recruit,t_enterprise where recruit_post_id = enterprise_id
select * from t_recruit,t_enterprise where recruit_post_id = enterprise_id and recruit_id = #{recruit_id}

select DISTINCT * from t_recruit t1,t_enterprise t2 where recruit_post_id = enterprise_id and (t2.enterprise_name like concat('%',#{enterprise_name},'%') or t1.position like concat('%',#{position},'%'))
SELECT * from delivery t1,t_user t2,t_enterprise t3,t_recruit t4 WHERE t1.userid = t2.user_id and t1.enid = t3.enterprise_id and t1.reid = t4.recruit_id and t1.userid =#{userid} and t1.state='adopt'
SELECT * from delivery t1,t_user t2,t_enterprise t3,t_recruit t4 WHERE t1.userid = t2.user_id and t1.enid = t3.enterprise_id and t1.reid = t4.recruit_id and t1.id=#{id}
